full_summary:
================UPPORT
# Aviation Replacement Parts
^{[1. English](# English)  [2. French](# French)}
### Government Tender Announcement

The Department of National Defence (DND) has released a tender announcement for Aviation Replacement Parts, under solicitation number W8485-237222/A.

#### Tender Summary
* **Solicitation Number**: W8485-237222/A
* **Tender Closing Date**: January 13, 2023, 14:00 EST
* **Gait Identification Number (GSIN)**: 4820 (Valves, Nonpowered)
* **Planning Justification Number (Serial Number)**: 4820-01-340-2917 (Camplate, Valve)
* **Quantity**: 60 units
* **Unit of Issue**: Each
* **Delivery Location**: 25 Canadian Forces Supply Depot, Montreal, Canada

#### Notice Type
This is a **Request for Proposal (RFP)**, subject to **Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)**.

#### Posting Details
* **Publication Date**: December 12, 2022
* **Attachment**: RFP document available at [canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/13/c4a2facaa7d66f39294f884e4d6acab9/rfp_-_w8485-237222_-eng.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/12/13/c4a2facaa7d66f39294f884e4d6acab9/rfp_-_w8485-237222_-eng.pdf)

#### Important Details
* **Language**: Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French).
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Region of Opportunity**: Canada
* **Region of Delivery**: Quebec (except National Capital Region)

#### Contact Information
* **Contact Name**: Steve Duval-Urbain
* **Contact Email**: STEVE.DUVALURBAIN@forces.gc.ca
* **Contact Phone**: 999-999-9999

The Department of National Defence invites qualified suppliers to submit their proposals under this tender announcement. Please review the RFP document for detailed requirements and instructions. Contact Steve Duval-Urbain to inquire about this opportunity. 

### Contracting Entity
Department of National Defence, 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON
